# STATS::STAT_SET_FLOAT

## Summary
Set the value of an Float stat.

## Parameters
* **STATSENUM** keyHash
* **FLOAT** data
* **BOOL** coderAssert = true

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Example:
 STATS::STAT_SET_FLOAT(MISC::GET_HASH_KEY("MP0_WEAPON_ACCURACY"), 66.6f, true);
